channel.title: Immortal's Sword
channel.description: I was looking for more complicated swords to do and saw this so i decided to make it textures coming soon Pic's: Sword [IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/ImmortalsSword1-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/ImmortalsSword2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/ImmortalsSword3.jpg[/img] Wireframe [IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/ImmortalsSword4.jpg[/img] C.C please!

item.title: Immortal's Sword
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Google Mr Google
item.description:
@Mr_Google wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:15, topic:395353”][quote author=Mr Google link=topic=492539.msg3602027#msg3602027 date=1305680781]

You have to learn how to mirror swords, because you made this free hand for both sides and it looks like a three year old made it no offence.

non taken i have no idea how to do hardly anything in metaseq lol

Read my damn sig already -_-
I’ve had a bunch of people pm me and say it’s great.

i did and i know that stuff just dont no mirroring and cuple other stuff
[/quote]
You shouldn’t need to mirror if it’s made out of primitives [/quote]
is made out of prims but i started doing this sword halfed lol

Read full topic
